column4: I've tried to escape out every non alphanumeric character in the string thus - http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/627781/ ...but it is still not working? What have I missed? can anyone find it?
I usually use a script to perform escapes on long strings.  Easier than relying on a manually editing a file

do you know of any online conversion tools that would automatically escape a long string for me? I googled for such a thing about an hour ago, but couldn't seem to find one which puts the "\" escapes in...
